00019 // event hanlder for window.error      
00020 W.onerror = function (msg, url, linenumber, sysMsg){
00021   var message = '[WEDNUS] ';                 
00022   if(typeof sysMsg == 'undefined') message += 'An Internal Error Detected.\n\n\n';
00023   else message = sysMsg +'\n\n\n';
00024   message += 'Error: '+ msg +'\n\nLocation: '+url+' (Line:'+linenumber+')\n\n';
00025   alert(message);
00026   return true;
00027 };
00028 //window.onerror = W.onerror;

00036 W.halt = function(isBroadcast){
00037     var undefined;
00038     W = undefined;
00039     if(isBroadcast){
00040         document.write('Wednus Platform has halted.');
00041         document.write('<br><br>');
00042         for(var i in window)
00043             document.write(i +', ');
00044         document.close();
00045     }
00046 };
